thread.title: FDA Approves Migraine Medicine

author: Thomas M. Burton
title: FDA Approves Migraine Medicine

organizations.name: migraine medicine the food and drug administration

text:
The Food and Drug Administration on Thursday approved a new migraine drug from Amgen Inc. and Novartis AG that doctors say can change patientsâ€™ lives by lowering the number of migraine days suffered by patients each month.
The drug, called Aimovig, was shown in three clinical trials to do better than placebo in lowering the incidence of migraines.
Migraines...
